description: A stub class for database initialization and logging, used as a placeholder for actual database interactions until real wiring with sqflite is implemented. Contains a method to ensure database is initialized, with debug logging for development.

classes.name: NotesDbStub
classes.description: A helper stub class providing minimal database interface functionality, mainly for development and testing purposes.

methods.name: ensureInitialized
methods.description: Asynchronously ensures the database is initialized. In the stub version, it logs the SQL table creation statement if in debug mode.
